name: Twittercube
body:
###_Just download the repository and then check NEED_TO_INSTALL and the User's Manual.pdf._

## Asking Experts
Do you have any quetions that you don't know who can turn to ask? Come here! We can find those experts concerning your problem in twitter!

## Event Tracking
Wondering what happens right now? Want to know how a big event exposes? In here see how magic happens! 

## Exploring
Have you ever wondered what a twitter society looks like? Do you want to discover new amazing stuff just by clicking your mouse? Then what are you waiting for!

If you have any questions, feel free to contact iswangheng@gmail.com
tagline: Twitter Cube is built by HKUST students and is a magic place where you can find amazing things within twitter!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
